A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a huge star wars fan\, someone who has been to theaters at least once for every film released since I was born\, someone who comes from a Star wars family\, and someone who had the highest hopes for this movie I could not have been more diasappinted. The story was poorly thought out\, did not feel like star wars\, wasted several golden opportunities\,  and more than it's share  clean misses. Very poor job.
